item.title: Hadoop优化笔记|Hadoop2.x 配置文件
item.description: hadooop-env.sh # Set Hadoop-specific environment variables here. # The only required environment variable is JAVA_HOME. All others are # optional. When running a distributed configuration it is best to # set JAVA_HOME in this file, so that it is correctly defined on # remote nodes. # The java implementation to use. # 两种配置方法：一是在 hadoop-env.sh 中配置；二是在
